description: The trap is generated when a new network element is online.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnNeOnline HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnNeInfoNeId s EXAM HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIpType i 0 HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIp s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnCompanyName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnDeviceType s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::hpnicfIpRanDcnDeviceMac s EXAMPL

description: This is the network element ID uniquely identifying

description: The bridge MAC address of the network element.
